content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: ARM
      operator: is_contained_by_case_insensitive
      value:
        - Screen Failure
        - Not Assigned
        - Not Treated
        - Unplanned Treatment
Core:
  Id: CORE-000115
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when ARM is 'Screen Failure', 'Not Assigned', 'Unplanned
  Treatment', 'Not Treated'
Outcome:
  Message: ARM cannot be equal to 'Screen Failure', 'Not Assigned', 'Unplanned Treatment'
    or 'Not Treated'.
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0570
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The trial arms table describes each planned arm in
                  the trial.
                Document: SDTMIG v3.4
                Section: '7.2'
              - Cited Guidance: The trial arms table describes each planned arm in
                  the trial.
                Document: SDTMIG v3.4
                Section: 7.3.1
              - Cited Guidance: The trial arms table describes each planned arm in
                  the trial.
                Document: SDTMIG v3.4
                Section: '5.2'
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - TRIAL DESIGN
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - DM
      - TA
      - TV

json.Description: Raise an error when ARM is 'Screen Failure', 'Not Assigned', 'Unplanned Treatment', 'Not Treated'
